metadata.name: Suspicious Diantz Alternate Data Stream Execution
metadata.comment: Compress target file into a cab file stored in the Alternate Data Stream (ADS) of the target file.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('diantz.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cab')) AND process.cmd_line rlike ':\[^\\\\\]')

output.summary: Compress target file into a cab file stored in the Alternate Data Stream (ADS) of the target file.
